name: Land of high rent & hot takes

content.html: I'm just sad there's no chance of Twitter doing what VW/Audi did when Porsche attempted a hostile takeover ("You've activated my trap card! *secures funding, conducts a hostile takeover of Porsche in retaliation*") because a Twitter-owned Tesla would be fucking hilarious
content.value: I'm just sad there's no chance of Twitter doing what VW/Audi did when Porsche attempted a hostile takeover ("You've activated my trap card! *secures funding, conducts a hostile takeover of Porsche in retaliation*") because a Twitter-owned Tesla would be fucking hilarious
